item-identification.catalog-item-id: REQUIRED if updating an existing Catalog Item. Enter its Catalog Item ID here. Do not include this tag if you are creating a new item, rather than updating an existing item.
item-identification.parent-catalog-item-id: REQUIRED if creating a new Catalog Item. Enter the Catalog Item ID of the existing Catalog Item under which this new item should be created. Do not include this tag if you are updating, and not creating an item.

general-information.dmp-type: Use one of the following list of possible values: Initial DMP, Updated DMP, Final DMP, Funding Proposal DMP (Grants/CAs), Updated DMP (Grants/CAs), Final DMP (Grants/CAs), Program-level DMP, No Data DMP.

programs.program: Program name. Consult https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/inport/help/components/programs for the list of Programs.
Program name. Consult https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/inport/help/components/programs for the list of Programs.
Program name. Consult https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/inport/help/components/programs for the list of Programs.

temporal-coverage.collection-scope: Use one of the following list of possible values: One-time, Ongoing, Unknown.
temporal-coverage.start-date: Enter the date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD), up to the appropriate granularity which is significant. For example, if the date is significant only up to the month, enter YYYY-MM.
temporal-coverage.end-date: Enter the date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD), up to the appropriate granularity which is significant. For example, if the date is significant only up to the month, enter YYYY-MM.

geographic-coverage.west-bound: Enter a numeric value greater than or equal to -180, and less than 180. All bounds must be supplied (no partial bounding boxes).
geographic-coverage.east-bound: Enter a numeric value greater than -180, and less than or equal to 180. All bounds must be supplied (no partial bounding boxes).
geographic-coverage.north-bound: Enter a numeric value between -90 to 90. All bounds must be supplied (no partial bounding boxes). The north bound must be greater or equal to the south bound.
geographic-coverage.south-bound: Enter a numeric value between -90 to 90. All bounds must be supplied (no partial bounding boxes). The north bound must be greater or equal to the south bound.

data-acquisition.has-data-acquisition-plan: Use one of the following list of possible values: Yes, No, In Development
data-acquisition.has-restricted-designations: Use one of the following list of possible values: Unrestricted, Restricted, In Development.

instrument.identifier: Instrument Name. Consult https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/inport/help/components/instruments for the list of Instruments.

platform.identifier: Platform Name. Consult https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/inport/help/components/platforms for the list of Platforms.

observing-system.system-name: Observing System Name. Consult https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/inport/help/components/observing-systems for the list of Observing Systems.

point-of-contact.contact-name: Contact Name. Consult https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/inport/help/components/contacts for the list of Contacts.
point-of-contact.contact-email: Contact Email. Either Contact Name or Contact Email is required (Contact Email preferred).
point-of-contact.contact-address: Only processed if the contact has a NOAA email address and does not exist in InPort. Enter the address line for the Contact.
point-of-contact.contact-address-city: Only processed if the contact has a NOAA email address and does not exist in InPort. Enter the city for the Contact.
point-of-contact.contact-address-state: Only processed if the contact has a NOAA email address and does not exist in InPort. Enter the State abbreviation for the Contact.
point-of-contact.contact-address-zip: Only processed if the contact has a NOAA email address and does not exist in InPort. Enter the zip code for the Contact.
point-of-contact.contact-address-country: Only processed if the contact has a NOAA email address and does not exist in InPort. Enter the country for the Contact.
point-of-contact.contact-phone-number: Only processed if the contact has a NOAA email address and does not exist in InPort. Enter the phone number for the Contact.
point-of-contact.contact-mobile-number: Only processed if the contact has a NOAA email address and does not exist in InPort. Enter the mobile number for the Contact.
point-of-contact.contact-fax-number: Only processed if the contact has a NOAA email address and does not exist in InPort. Enter the fax number for the Contact.
point-of-contact.contact-url: Only processed if the contact has a NOAA email address and does not exist in InPort. Enter the URL for the Contact.
point-of-contact.contact-url-name: Only processed if the contact has a NOAA email address and does not exist in InPort. Enter the name of the URL for the Contact.
point-of-contact.contact-url-description: Only processed if the contact has a NOAA email address and does not exist in InPort. Enter the description of the URL for the Contact.
point-of-contact.contact-url-function: Only processed if the contact has a NOAA email address and does not exist in InPort. Enter the function of the URL for the Contact, from the following list of possible values: Online Resource, Browse Graphic.
point-of-contact.contact-business-hours: Only processed if the contact has a NOAA email address and does not exist in InPort. Enter the business hours for the Contact.

responsible-party.contact-name: Contact Name. Consult https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/inport/help/components/contacts for the list of Contacts.
responsible-party.contact-email: Contact Email. Either Contact Name or Contact Email is required (Contact Email preferred).

resources.management-resources-available: Use one of the following list of possible values: Yes, No, Unknown
resources.dissemination-resources-available: Use one of the following list of possible values: Yes, No, Unknown
resources.archive-resources-available: Use one of the following list of possible values: Yes, No, Unknown

data-access.restriction-status: Use one of the following list of possible values: Unrestricted, Partially Restricted, Fully Restricted
data-access.data-for-publication: Use one of the following list of possible values: Yes, No, To Be Determined

data-access-methods.data-access-method: Use one of the following list of possible values: NCEI, Web Service, API, FTP Bulk Download, HTTP Bulk Download, Website, Web Page, or Portal, Asynchronous Ordering Service, To Be Determined, Unable to Provide Access

data-access.cloud-access: Use one of the following list of possible values: Yes, No, To Be Determined
data-access.access-level-of-service: Use one of the following list of possible values: Basic Access, Long Term Preservation and Basic Access, Enhanced Access and Basic Quality Assurance, Scientific Improvements, Derived Products, Authoritative Records, National Services and International Leadership

dissemination-plans.dissemination-plan: Use one of the following list of possible values: No Delay, At Publication, 2 Years After Collection, 2 Years After Project End Date, To Be Determined, Unable to Provide Access, Limited Access Only, No Access Intended

data-access.dissemination-date: Enter the date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

archive-locations.archive-location: Use one of the following list of possible values: NCEI, Other Approved Federal Archive, NARA, To Be Determined, Unable to Archive, No Archiving Intended

related-item.catalog-item-id: REQUIRED for each related-item. Enter the Cat ID of the item to create a related item link to.
related-item.relationship-type: REQUIRED for each related-item. Enter the relationship type from the following list of possible values: Cross Reference, Larger Work Citation, Part of a Seamless Database, Stereo Mate, Revision Of, Series.
related-item.notes: Enter notes on the relationship between this Catalog Item and the one linked to.

tags.tag: Enter a tag for the record.
